short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Determine if a NPO's tax information is consistent with its proclaimed charitable commitment.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Charitable aims to make a nonprofit organization's (NPO) financial details easier to understand. Currently, navigating financial information is a hassle that benefits badly-run organizations. This obfuscation of information necessitates further research into NPOs so that donors can ensure the appropriate use of their contributions. Charitable aids a donor's decision making process by running calculations on queried Form 990 data via ProPublica's API, revealing whether a given NPO's IRS tax information matches their proclaimed charitable commitment.
